description: Acta is a scientific association in Colombia celebrating 50 years of advancing food science and technology. Its mission focuses on knowledge transfer to enhance the agro-industrial and agri-food sectors. Acta collaborates with international entities and offers memberships to food production companies, universities, and public institutions. The organization emphasizes food safety, regulatory affairs, and sensory analysis, aiming to strengthen food systems and promote scientific understanding within the industry and among consumers.
name: Acta
